The injury-depleted Raptors displayed the depth of their roster once again en route to a 103-91 win over the visiting Memphis Grizzlies. "That's our strength, especially with such a long season, so many things can happen, said Anthony Parker . Anthony Parker finished with 19 points to top Toronto( 8-7), which used a balanced attack to beat the struggling Grizzlies, with seven players scoring in double figures.
